startUrls.title: Start URLs
startUrls.description: URLs to start crawling from. The crawler will follow links from these pages.

maxCrawlDepth.title: Max Crawl Depth
maxCrawlDepth.description: Maximum depth of links to follow from start URLs

maxPagesPerDomain.title: Max Pages Per Domain
maxPagesPerDomain.description: Maximum number of pages to crawl per domain (affects cost)

topicKeywords.title: Topic Keywords (Optional)
topicKeywords.description: Filter content by topic keywords. Only pages matching these topics will be collected. Leave empty to collect all content.

contentSelectors.title: Content Selectors (Optional)
contentSelectors.description: CSS selectors for main content (e.g., 'article', '.content', '#main'). Leave empty for automatic detection.

excludeSelectors.title: Exclude Selectors
excludeSelectors.description: CSS selectors to exclude (navigation, ads, etc.)

includeMetadata.title: Include Metadata
includeMetadata.description: Include page title, URL, date, and extracted keywords

autoTagging.title: Auto-Tagging
autoTagging.description: Automatically extract and tag content by topics using NLP

minContentLength.title: Min Content Length (words)
minContentLength.description: Minimum word count for collected pages

tokenLimit.title: Token Limit (Optional)
tokenLimit.description: Stop crawling after collecting this many tokens. Leave empty for no limit.

embeddings.title: Generate Embeddings
embeddings.description: Prepare content for vector databases (adds embedding-ready format)

mcpCompatible.title: MCP-Compatible Output
mcpCompatible.description: Format output for Model Context Protocol (Claude/GPT integration)
